name: Franken Pumpkin
description: This is the first somewhat full game I have ever released publicly. Im not a Game developer by trade, Im just learning it in my spare time. The big thing I wanted to get out of this game was figuring out how to implement multiplayer. Anyways I hope you like it, and feel free to leave feedback. Keep in mind I built this in about 1.5/2 weeks after work  lol (:
